name: typedash
description: Minimal (and naive) implementation subset of lodash functions in typescript
author: arusanov <alexander.rusanov@gmail.com>

scripts.prebuild: rimraf dist && rimraf docs && rimraf lib
scripts.build: npm run bundle && npm run optimize && npm run minify && npm run size
scripts.bundle: tsc && rollup -f umd -m dist/typedash.dev.js.map -n typedash -o dist/typedash.dev.js lib/typedash.js
scripts.optimize: uglifyjs dist/typedash.dev.js -c conditionals=false,sequences=false,loops=false,join_vars=false,collapse_vars=false -b width=120,quote_style=3 -o dist/typedash.js -p relative --in-source-map dist/typedash.dev.js.map --source-map dist/typedash.js.map
scripts.minify: uglifyjs dist/typedash.js -c collapse_vars,evaluate,screw_ie8,unsafe,loops=false,keep_fargs=false,pure_getters,unused,dead_code -m -o dist/typedash.min.js -p relative --in-source-map dist/typedash.js.map --source-map dist/typedash.min.js.map
scripts.test:prod: npm run lint && npm run test -- --coverage --no-cache
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
scripts.prepush: npm run test:prod && npm run build

validate-commit-msg.helpMessage: Use "npm run commit" instead, we use conventional-changelog format :) (https://github.com/commitizen/cz-cli)
